review: Set up was ridiculously easy. The only glitch was with my Sony HT-XT1 sound bar. The  Fire TV device needs to plug into the sound bar next to the blu-ray to get sound from the sound bar.The user interface works great and is as intuitive as anything I have ever used. Haven't used the voice activation yet.Overall I am thrilled and love the device.
author: Mark Braidhill

review: Fire TV came registered and was easy to install and navigate.  We LOVE the microphone feature!  Being from New York City I often have to put on my "radio voice" when utilizing voice commands but not with Amazon Fire Voice remote!  As a Prime member this is a HUGE value to the membership with so many free TV and movie choices.  I was reluctant to renew my Prime membership but now it pays!  Thanks, Amazon!
